trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lander
There were no other sightings in Lander on or around April 3rd 2012
divs: sighting detailslander, wy 04\03\2011 11:38pm-12:08am (about this time) bright object pulsing red, blue, white. about 195 degrees s.sw, distance unknown, about 30 derees up from horizon. 1. where were you and what were you doing at the time. i went out on our back porch to smoke a cigarett when i saw the light.i go out there to smoke every night. 2. what made you first notice the object? it was not what i normaly see in the sky. 3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? well i knew something was up! 4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.bright object pulsing red, blue, white. about 195 degrees s.sw, distance unknown, about 30 derees up from horizon. 5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.i was surprised! 6. how did you lose sight of the object? it just seemed to disapear? or fade away?
